paw.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an animal’s foot that has nails or claws
paw.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: someone’s hand – used when you are annoyed or angry
paw.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Keep your filthy paws off me!
paw.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: if an animal paws a surface, it touches or rubs one place several times with its paw
paw.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The dog’s pawing at the door again – let him out.
paw.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to feel or touch someone in a rough or sexual way that is offensive
paw.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: He’d had too much to drink and started pawing me.
